Suite.Title: Siteimprove

RestConnector.Title: List Sites
RestConnector.HelpText: Get a list of sites for this account.

RestConnector.Title: Lookup a Site
RestConnector.HelpText: Get a specific site for this account.

RestConnector.Title: DCI Scores
RestConnector.HelpText: Get all DCI scores associated with this site.

RestConnector.Title: Page Status by URL
RestConnector.HelpText: Check status for a page specified by Url.

RestConnector.Title: Page Status by Id
RestConnector.HelpText: Check status for a page via page id.

RestConnector.Title: Site Crawl Status
RestConnector.HelpText: Get info about the crawl status for a site.

RestConnector.Title: List Pages
RestConnector.HelpText: Get list of pages for a site.

RestConnector.Title: Page Details
RestConnector.HelpText: Get page details for a page.

RestConnector.Title: SEO Issues
RestConnector.HelpText: Get all SEO issues on your website.

RestConnector.Title: Page Issues
RestConnector.HelpText: Get SEO issues for a specific page.

RestConnector.Title: List Pages
RestConnector.HelpText: Get all pages that are being checked for SEO issues.

RestConnector.Title: Visit Depth
RestConnector.HelpText: Get the visit depth. Depth relates to the number of page views for each visit.

RestConnector.Title: Visit Depth History
RestConnector.HelpText: A series of historical data points showing the average amount of page views.

RestConnector.Title: Activity by Hour
RestConnector.HelpText: Get the distribution of visits and page views over hours of the day.

RestConnector.Title: Activity by Monthday
RestConnector.HelpText: Get the distribution of visits and page views over day of the month.

RestConnector.Title: Activity by Weekday
RestConnector.HelpText: Get the distribution of visits and page views over weekday.

RestConnector.Title: Visit Length
RestConnector.HelpText: Get the length of a visit. Length relates to the duration (in minutes) of each visit.

RestConnector.Title: Visit Length History
RestConnector.HelpText: A series of historical data points showing the average visit length. Length relates to the duration (in minutes) of each visit.

RestConnector.Title: All Pages
RestConnector.HelpText: Get all pages identified on your site.

RestConnector.Title: Entry Pages
RestConnector.HelpText: An entry page is the first page a visitor sees when they enter the website.

RestConnector.Title: Exit Pages
RestConnector.HelpText: An exit page is the last page a visitor sees before they leave the website.

RestConnector.Title: Least Popular Pages
RestConnector.HelpText: Get the least popular pages among the top 1000 pages with the most page views.

RestConnector.Title: Most Popular Pages
RestConnector.HelpText: Get the least most pages among the top 1000 pages with the most page views.

RestConnector.Title: Navigation Depth
RestConnector.HelpText: Get the average number of clicks (pages visited) to get to a certain page.

RestConnector.Title: Outbound Links
RestConnector.HelpText: Get links to external domains, that have been used to leave your site.

RestConnector.Title: Outbound Link History
RestConnector.HelpText: A series of historical data points showing the amount of visits for a specific outbound link.

RestConnector.Title: Pages Load Time
RestConnector.HelpText: Get the average amount of time (in seconds) it takes a page to load.

RestConnector.Title: Bounce Rates
RestConnector.HelpText: List of pages with bounces and bounce rate.

RestConnector.Title: Entries and Exits
RestConnector.HelpText: List the amount of entries and exits registered for your pages.

RestConnector.Title: Page Last Outbound Links
RestConnector.HelpText: The last outbound links and their amount of clicks for a specific exit page.

RestConnector.Title: Overview Summary
RestConnector.HelpText: Get a summary of the most common statistics for your site.

RestConnector.Title: Overview History
RestConnector.HelpText: A series of historical data points showing the most common statistics for your site.

RestConnector.Title: Online Visitors
RestConnector.HelpText: Get the current online visitors.

RestConnector.Title: Direct Traffic Entry Pages
RestConnector.HelpText: Entry pages for the visits that have started through a direct entry to your website (for example from a bookmark) and not through an external referrer or search engine.

RestConnector.Title: External Referring Domains
RestConnector.HelpText: External domains that have referred visitors to your website.

RestConnector.Title: External Referring Pages
RestConnector.HelpText: Pages on external domains that have referred visitors to your website.

RestConnector.Title: External Search Terms
RestConnector.HelpText: Search terms that have been used on external search engines to reach the website.

RestConnector.Title: External Search Engines
RestConnector.HelpText: Search engines that have referred visitors to your website.

RestConnector.Title: External Social Media
RestConnector.HelpText: Get the social media organisations that have referred visitors to your website.

RestConnector.Title: External Social Media Site History
RestConnector.HelpText: A series of historical data points showing the visits for the specified social media site.

RestConnector.Title: Browsers by Visitors
RestConnector.HelpText: Get the browsers used by your visitors.

RestConnector.Title: Countries of Visitors
RestConnector.HelpText: Overview of where visitors come from divided by country.

RestConnector.Title: Devices by Visitors
RestConnector.HelpText: See which type of device is being utilised the most.

RestConnector.Title: Organisations from Visitors
RestConnector.HelpText: Get a list of visiting organisations, identified through IP address.
